name: Pitchdeck Presentation Studio
description:
Magically turn your Figma designs into animated slide decks or export them to PowerPoint


Features


  • Super easy animations and real-time previews inside Figma.
  • Add GIFs and video embeds to layers in your slides.
  • Add slide links or website URL links to layers in your slides.
  • Built-it GIPHY and Pixabay search integrations.
  • Quickly re-order slides by visual position, Figma layer order or drag and drop.
  • Set approval workflow statuses to keep track of which slides are ready.
  • Export files for PowerPoint/Keynote/Google Slides, with editable text.
  • Export to a PDF file (with optional password protection).
  • Automatically generates password protected presentation URLs.
  • Simple, seamless and easy to use presentations in the browser.
  • Includes speaker notes, timer, laser pointer, and slide controls.
  • Control your presentation from your phone/tablet by scanning a QR code.
  • Present in fullscreen with notes and controls on a second screen.
  • Spell check your Figma slides in dozens of languages.


To use Pitchdeck


  1. Install Pitchdeck and create a new Figma project.
  2. Create as many frames (slides) as you need for your presentation.
  3. Add images and text layers to your frames to design the slides.
  4. Run Pitchdeck inside the page containing your frames.
  5. Apply animations, embed URLs, links or notes to each slide.
  6. Click the Export Presentation button.
  7. Select format/options and click Export or Upload.
  8. Enjoy your presentation!


Documentation & Video Tutorials


For plugin documentation and step by step video tutorials, please visit https://docs.hypermatic.com/pitchdeck


Bug Reports


Pitchdeck is still a baby panda; if you notice any bugs, please get in touch via https://hypermatic.com/contact and we'll publish a fix as soon as possible.


License


After you've tried exporting presentations with Pitchdeck 10 times, you'll be asked to enter your license key. Your license key will allow you or your team to animate and export an unlimited amount of presentations using Pitchdeck.


To purchase a license or to find out more, please visit https://hypermatic.com/pitchdeck
